stimulusHtml: In Old Manâ€™s Cloth, the artist El Anatsui claims that one possible interpretation of his use of materials such as bottle caps to create meaning is that
choicesHtml: liquor bottle caps represent the transatlantic trade for slaves and alcohol
old, discarded items such as bottle caps can become renewed through art
the Western world treats Africa as a resource for mining metal ore
Africa should build a sustainable economy through recycling
